snippet: Cmdr. Ian Lafrenière of the Montreal Police said investigators believed that the suspect, Luka Rocco Magnotta, had fled, possibly to France, based on evidence found at his apartment.
lead_paragraph: Cmdr. Ian Lafrenière of the Montreal Police said investigators believed that the suspect, Luka Rocco Magnotta, had fled, possibly to France, based on evidence found at his apartment.

headline.main: Canada: Police Say That Man Suspected in Grisly Killing May Have Fled Country
headline.print_headline: Canada: Police Say That Man Suspected In Grisly Killing May Have Fled Country
